title: McLaren disaster as Norris & Piastri crash in US GP sprint race while Verstappen wins
summary: A catastrophic start to the 2025 United States Grand Prix sprint race saw Oscar Piastri bumped into Lando Norris, taking both McLarens out of the race. Victory for Max Verstappen saw him close in the title race

qa_pairs.question: Who won the 2025 United States Grand Prix sprint race?
Which team had both of its drivers crash out during the sprint race in the 2025 US GP?
What was the outcome for Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri in the sprint race at the 2025 US GP?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Both crashed out of the race
wrong_options: Both retired due to mechanical failure
